themes: city funding prioritizes sports over arts
decaying infrastructure at Dougherty Arts Center
need for advocacy for the arts
perceived lack of city support for arts
arts as underdog in funding decisions
key_phrases: we can talk talk talk, but it all comes down to money
the Dougherty Arts Center a badly needed new building instead of the rodent-infested, decaying one
COA has shown what it values and the citizens follow
ACME must be an advocate that convinces the city that the time to show and prove has arrived
The arts are dying here and we need their support much more than well-sponsored and frequented endeavors, such as sports do
barriers_identified: city prioritizing sports and newer facilities over arts
perceived lack of advocacy for arts
solutions_proposed: ACME must be an advocate that convinces the city to support the arts
